item.title: How to withdraw ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: A. Set up: Create an on-chain crypto wallet Install the extension on your browser Go to https://metamask.io/download/ and Click ‚ÄúInstall Metamask for Chromium‚Äù Add the wallet extension to the Chrome on Firefox Browser (DO NOT use Safari) Follow guideline to create a wallet

item.title: $icy in 2024

item.description: Follow up on our recent post df protocol, $icy and $dfg. Since 2020, $icy has been a part of our workflow.

item.title: $icy Salary Advance
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As we said in our recent post $icy in 2024 plan. Today, we’re launching the first feature from our 2024 roadmap: an $icy salary advance.
